headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names. MUST be uppercase for top-level headers.

accent.name: Electric Volt
accent.description: Use sparingly for CTAs, hover states, and kinetic energy.

theme_strategy.mode: Light Mode default for Shop, Dark Mode for Hero/Marketing sections.
theme_strategy.admin_customization: Use CSS variables (--primary-brand) for dashboard accents to allow admin theming.

layout_grid.grid_system: Use 'Bento' style grids for marketing (asymmetrical) and strict 4-col grids for product catalogs.

buttons.style: Sharp edges (rounded-none) or minimal radius (rounded-sm). Uppercase text. Bold weight.
buttons.hover: Slide-up text effect or background fill animation.

cards.style: Minimalist. No visible borders by default. Large image area (aspect-[3/4]).
cards.hover: Image scale (zoom-in) + Title slide up. No shadow, just pure visual focus.

navigation.style: Floating glassmorphism header or solid minimal bar. Mega-menu for categories.

forms.style: Underlined inputs (border-b) or flat solid backgrounds. No outlines.

css_3d_hero.technique: CSS perspective: 1000px + transform: rotateY() on mouse move.
css_3d_hero.implementation_note: Create a container with 'perspective'. The inner element (jersey image) has 'transform-style: preserve-3d'. Use JS to update --rotateX and --rotateY variables based on mouse position.

scroll_effects.library: Framer Motion or Lenis for smooth scroll.

micro_interactions.hover: Magnetic buttons (button moves slightly towards cursor).

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with dark overlay.

lifestyle_1.usage: About section or 'Join the Team' CTA.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on images has a backdrop-blur or dark gradient overlay.

instructions_to_main_agent.3: Implement the 'Floating Jersey' 3D effect in the Hero component using pure CSS transforms driven by mousemove event listeners.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Ensure the Admin Dashboard uses CSS variables for colors so the 'Theme Customization' feature works.
instructions_to_main_agent.5: Use the 'Barlow Condensed' font for all headings to give that 'Nike/Gatorade' athletic feel.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Do not use standard Shadcn cards for products; build a custom minimal product card.
instructions_to_main_agent.7: For the 'Dynamic Theme System', create a Context Provider that updates the root CSS variables.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.design_philosophy: Avoid generic AI layouts. Use asymmetry, overlap, and bold typography.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.interactions: Every button must have a hover state. Every page transition must be smooth.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
